 Event (DSI::InstanceBase *instance, int eventID, int setEnableRequestID)
 

Detailed Description

The newSampleReceivedEx2 event is raised when a depth sample is captured.

Member Function Documentation

void DepthSense::DepthNode::NewSampleReceivedEx2Event::connect ( void(*)(DepthSense::DepthNode obj, DepthSense::DepthNode::NewSampleReceivedEx2Data data)  handlerFunc)
inline

Connects a function to the current event. The parameters of the supplied function must be:

obj the object for which the event was raised
data the event parameters
Parameters
handlerFuncthe handler function
Exceptions
DepthSense::ArgumentExceptionhandlerFunc is already connected to the current event
std::bad_allocnot enough memory to perform the requested operation
